GSD36nars2_pu:279: kṛtaṃ vā yad ṛṇaṃ kṛcchre dadyāt putrasya tat pitā // Nar_1.09 //
GSD36nars2_pu:281: kuṭumbahetor utkṣiptaṃ voḍhavyaṃ tat kuṭumbinā // Nar_1.10 //
GSD36nars2_pu:282: nārvāg viṃśatimād varṣāt pitari proṣite sutaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:283: ṛṇaṃ dadyāt pitṛvye vā jyeṣṭhe bhrātary athāpi vā // Nar_1.11 //
GSD36nars2_pu:284: dāpyaḥ pararṇam eko 'pi jīvatsv adhikṛtaiḥ kṛtam /
GSD36nars2_pu:285: preteṣu tu na tatputraḥ pararṇaṃ dātum arhati // Nar_1.12 //
GSD36nars2_pu:286: na strī patikṛtaṃ dadyād ṛṇaṃ putrakṛtaṃ tathā /
GSD36nars2_pu:287: abhyupetād ṛte yadvā saha patyā kṛtaṃ bhavet // Nar_1.13 //
GSD36nars2_pu:288: dadyād aputrā vidhavā niyuktā yā mumūrṣuṇā /
GSD36nars2_pu:289: yo vā tadriktham ādadyād yato riktham ṛṇaṃ tataḥ // Nar_1.14 //
GSD36nars2_pu:290: na ca bhāryākṛtam ṛṇaṃ kathaṃcit patyur ābhavet /
GSD36nars2_pu:291: āpatkṛtād ṛte puṃsāṃ kuṭumbārtho hi vistaraḥ // Nar_1.15 //
GSD36nars2_pu:293: teṣāṃ tatpratyayā vṛttiḥ kuṭumbaṃ ca tadāśrayam // Nar_1.16 //
GSD36nars2_pu:294: putriṇī tu samutsṛjya putraṃ strī yānyam āśrayet /
GSD36nars2_pu:295: ṛkthaṃ tasyā haret sarvaṃ niḥsvāyāḥ putra eva tu // Nar_1.17 //
GSD36nars2_pu:296: yā tu sapradhanaiva strī sāpatyā cānyam āśrayet /
GSD36nars2_pu:297: so 'syā dadyād ṛṇaṃ bhartur utsṛjed vā tathaiva tām // Nar_1.18 //
GSD36nars2_pu:298: adhanasya hy aputrasya mṛtasyopaiti yaḥ striyam /
GSD36nars2_pu:299: ṛṇaṃ voḍhuḥ sa bhajate tad evāsya dhanaṃ smṛtam // Nar_1.19 //
GSD36nars2_pu:302: uttamā svairiṇī yā syād uttamā ca punarbhuvām /
GSD36nars2_pu:303: ṛṇaṃ tayoḥ patikṛtaṃ dadyād yas tām upāśnute // Nar_1.21 //
GSD36nars2_pu:306: etāny api pramāṇāni bhartā yady anumanyate /
GSD36nars2_pu:307: putraḥ patyur abhāve vā rājā vā patiputrayoḥ // Nar_1.23 //
GSD36nars2_pu:308: bhartrā prītena yad dattaṃ striyai tasmin mṛte 'pi tat /
GSD36nars2_pu:309: sā yathākāmam aśnīyād dadyād vā sthāvarād ṛte // Nar_1.24 //
GSD36nars2_pu:311: anyatra svāmisaṃdeśān na dāsaḥ prabhur ātmanaḥ // Nar_1.25 //
GSD36nars2_pu:312: putreṇa ca kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ yat syāt pitur anicchataḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:313: tad apy akṛtam evāhur dāsaḥ putraś ca tau samau // Nar_1.26 //
GSD36nars2_pu:314: aprāptavyavahāraś cet svatantro 'pi hi na rṇabhāk /
GSD36nars2_pu:315: svātantryaṃ tu smṛtaṃ jyeṣṭhe jyaiṣṭhyaṃ guṇavayaḥkṛtam // Nar_1.27 //
GSD36nars2_pu:316: trayaḥ svatantrā loke 'smin rājācāryas tathaiva ca /
GSD36nars2_pu:317: prati prati ca varṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ svagṛhe gṛhī // Nar_1.28 //
GSD36nars2_pu:319: asvatantraḥ smṛtaḥ śiṣya ācārye tu svatantratā // Nar_1.29 //
GSD36nars2_pu:320: asvatantrāḥ striyaḥ putrā dāsāś ca saparigrahāḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:321: svatantras tatra tu gṛhī yasya yat syāt kramāgatam // Nar_1.30 //
GSD36nars2_pu:322: garbhasthaiḥ sadṛśo jñeya ā varṣād aṣṭamāc chiṣuḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:323: bāla ā ṣoḍaśāj jñeyaḥ pogaṇḍaś cāpi śabdyate // Nar_1.31 //
GSD36nars2_pu:325: jīvator asvatantraḥ syāj jarayāpi samanvitaḥ // Nar_1.32 //
GSD36nars2_pu:327: abhāve bījino mātā tadabhāve tu pūrvajaḥ // Nar_1.33 //
GSD36nars2_pu:329: anuśiṣṭau visarge ca vikraye ceśvarā matāḥ // Nar_1.34 //
GSD36nars2_pu:330: yad bālaḥ kurute kāryam asvatantras tathaiva ca /
GSD36nars2_pu:331: akṛtaṃ tad iti prāhuḥ śāstre śāstravido janāḥ // Nar_1.35 //
GSD36nars2_pu:332: svatantro 'pi hi yat kāryaṃ kuryād aprakṛtiṃ gataḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:333: tad apy akṛtam evāhur asvatantraḥ sa hetutaḥ // Nar_1.36 //
GSD36nars2_pu:335: rāgadveṣaparītāś ca jñeyās tv aprakṛtiṃ gatāḥ // Nar_1.37 //
GSD36nars2_pu:336: kule jyeṣṭhas tathā śreṣṭhaḥ prakṛtisthaś ca yo bhavet /
GSD36nars2_pu:337: tatkṛtaṃ syāt kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ nāsvatantrakṛtaṃ kṛtam // Nar_1.38 //
GSD36nars2_pu:338: dhanamūlāḥ kriyāḥ sarvā yatnas tatsādhane mataḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:339: rakṣaṇaṃ vardhanaṃ bhoga iti tasya vidhiḥ kramāt // Nar_1.39 //
GSD36nars2_pu:340: tat punas trividhaṃ jñeyaṃ śuklaṃ śabalam eva ca /
GSD36nars2_pu:341: kṛṣṇaṃ ca tasya vijñeyaḥ prabhedaḥ saptadhā pṛthak // Nar_1.40 //
GSD36nars2_pu:343: dhanaṃ saptavidhaṃ śuklam udayo 'py asya tadvidhaḥ // Nar_1.41 //
GSD36nars2_pu:345: kṛtopakārād āptaṃ ca śabalaṃ samudāhṛtam // Nar_1.42 //
GSD36nars2_pu:347: vyājenopārjitaṃ yac ca tat kṛṣṇaṃ samudāhṛtam // Nar_1.43 //
GSD36nars2_pu:348: tena krayo vikrayaś ca dānaṃ grahaṇam eva ca /
GSD36nars2_pu:349: vividhāś ca pravartante kriyāḥ saṃbhoga eva ca // Nar_1.44 //
GSD36nars2_pu:350: yathāvidhena dravyeṇa yat kiṃcit kurute naraḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:351: tathāvidham avāpnoti sa phalaṃ pretya ceha ca // Nar_1.45 //
GSD36nars2_pu:353: sādhāraṇaṃ syāt trividhaṃ śeṣaṃ navavidhaṃ smṛtam // Nar_1.46 //
GSD36nars2_pu:354: kramāgataṃ prītidāyaḥ prāptaṃ ca saha bhāryayā /
GSD36nars2_pu:355: aviśeṣeṇa varṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ trividhaṃ dhanam // Nar_1.47 //
GSD36nars2_pu:357: pratigraheṇa yallabdhaṃ yājyataḥ śiṣyatas tathā // Nar_1.48 //
GSD36nars2_pu:359: yuddhopalabdhaṃ kāraś ca daṇḍaś ca vyavahārataḥ // Nar_1.49 //
GSD36nars2_pu:362: sarveṣām eva varṇānām eṣa dharmyo dhanāgamaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:363: viparyayād adharmyaḥ syān na ced āpad garīyasī // Nar_1.51 //
GSD36nars2_pu:365: vaiśyavṛttis tataś coktā na jaghanyā kathaṃcana // Nar_1.52 //
GSD36nars2_pu:366: na kathaṃcana kurvīta brāhmaṇaḥ karma vārṣalam /
GSD36nars2_pu:367: vṛṣalaḥ karma na brāhmaṃ patanīye hi te tayoḥ // Nar_1.53 //
GSD36nars2_pu:368: utkṛṣṭaṃ cāpakṛṣṭaṃ ca tayoḥ karma na vidyate /
GSD36nars2_pu:369: madhyame karmaṇī hitvā sarvasādhāraṇe hi te // Nar_1.54 //
GSD36nars2_pu:370: āpadaṃ brāhmaṇas tīrtvā kṣatravṛttyā hṛtair dhanaiḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:371: utsṛjet kṣatravṛttiṃ tāṃ kṛtvā pāvanam ātmanaḥ // Nar_1.55 //
GSD36nars2_pu:372: tasyām eva tu yo vṛttau brāhmaṇo ramate rasāt /
GSD36nars2_pu:373: kāṇḍapṛṣṭhaś cyuto mārgāt so 'pāṅkteyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // Nar_1.56 //
GSD36nars2_pu:380: brāhmaṇasya tu vikreyaṃ śuṣkaṃ dāru tṛṇāni ca /
GSD36nars2_pu:382: svayaṃ śīrṇaṃ ca vidalaṃ phalānāṃ badareṅgude /
GSD36nars2_pu:383: rajjuḥ kārpāsikaṃ sūtraṃ tac ced avikṛtaṃ bhavet // Nar_1.61 //
GSD36nars2_pu:385: yady avaśyaṃ tu vikreyās tilā dhānyena tatsāmāḥ // Nar_1.62 //
GSD36nars2_pu:387: mārge punar avasthāpya rājñā daṇḍena bhūyasā // Nar_1.63 //
GSD36nars2_pu:389: sīdanti hi pramāṇāni pramāṇair avyavasthitaiḥ // Nar_1.64 //
GSD36nars2_pu:390: likhitaṃ sākṣiṇo bhuktiḥ pramāṇaṃ trividhaṃ smṛtaṃ /
GSD36nars2_pu:391: dhanasvīkaraṇe yena dhanī dhanam upāśnute // Nar_1.65 //
GSD36nars2_pu:392: likhitaṃ balavan nityaṃ jīvantas tv eva sākṣiṇaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:393: kālātiharaṇād bhuktir iti śāstreṣu niścayaḥ // Nar_1.66 //
GSD36nars2_pu:395: pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ guru jñeyaṃ bhuktir ebhyo garīyasī // Nar_1.67 //
GSD36nars2_pu:396: vidyamāne 'pi likhite jīvatsv api hi sākṣiṣu /
GSD36nars2_pu:397: viśeṣataḥ sthāvarāṇāṃ yan na bhuktaṃ na tat sthiram // Nar_1.68 //
GSD36nars2_pu:398: bhujyamānān parair arthān yaḥ svān maurkhyād upekṣate /
GSD36nars2_pu:399: samakṣaṃ jīvato 'py asya tān bhuktiḥ kurute vaśe // Nar_1.69 //
GSD36nars2_pu:400: yatkiṃcid daśa varṣāṇi saṃnidhau prekṣate dhanī /
GSD36nars2_pu:401: bhujyamānaṃ parais tūṣṇīṃ na sa tal labdhum arhati // Nar_1.70 //
GSD36nars2_pu:402: upekṣāṃ kurvatas tasya tūṣṇīṃ bhūtasya tiṣṭhataḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:403: kāle 'tipanne pūrvokte vyavahāro na sidhyati // Nar_1.71 //
GSD36nars2_pu:404: ajaḍaś ced apogaṇḍo viṣaye cāsya bhujyate /
GSD36nars2_pu:405: bhuktaṃ tad vyavahāreṇa bhoktā tad dhanam arhati // Nar_1.72 //
GSD36nars2_pu:407: rājasvaṃ śrotriyasvaṃ ca nopabhogena jīryate // Nar_1.73 //
GSD36nars2_pu:409: ādhyādīny api jīryante strīnarendradhanād ṛte // Nar_1.74 //
GSD36nars2_pu:410: strīdhanaṃ ca narendrāṇāṃ na kadācana jīryate /
GSD36nars2_pu:411: anāgamaṃ bhujyamānaṃ vatsarāṇāṃ śatair api // Nar_1.75 //
GSD36nars2_pu:412: nirbhogo yatra dṛśyeta na dṛśyetāgamaḥ kvacit /
GSD36nars2_pu:413: āgamaḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra na bhogas tatra kāraṇam // Nar_1.76 //
GSD36nars2_pu:414: anāgamaṃ bhujyate yan na tad bhogo 'tivartate /
GSD36nars2_pu:415: prete tu bhoktari dhanaṃ yāti tadvaṃśyabhogyatām // Nar_1.77 //
GSD36nars2_pu:417: bhuktir eva viśuddhiḥ syāt prāptānāṃ pitṛtaḥ kramāt // Nar_1.78 //
GSD36nars2_pu:419: apratyakṣaṃ ca yad bhuktaṃ ṣaḍ etāny āgamaṃ vinā // Nar_1.79 //
GSD36nars2_pu:421: putreṇa so 'rthaḥ saṃśodhyo na taṃ bhogo 'tivartate // Nar_1.80 //
GSD36nars2_pu:422: yad vināgamam apy ūrdhvaṃ bhuktaṃ pūrvais tribhir bhavet /
GSD36nars2_pu:423: na tac chakyam apākartuṃ kramāt tripuruṣāgatam // Nar_1.81 //
GSD36nars2_pu:424: santo 'pi na pramāṇaṃ syur mṛte dhanini sākṣiṇaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:425: anyatra śrāvitaṃ yat syāt svayam āsannamṛtyunā // Nar_1.82 //
GSD36nars2_pu:426: na hi pratyarthini prete pramāṇaṃ sākṣiṇāṃ vacaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:427: sākṣimat karaṇaṃ tatra pramāṇaṃ syād viniścaye // Nar_1.83 //
GSD36nars2_pu:428: śrāvitas tv ātureṇāpi yas tv artho dharmasaṃhitaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:429: mṛte 'pi tatra sākṣī syāt ṣaṭsu cānvāhitādiṣu // Nar_1.84 //
GSD36nars2_pu:433: tat kusīdam iti proktaṃ tena vṛttiḥ kusīdinām // Nar_1.86 //
GSD36nars2_pu:434: kāyikā kālikā caiva kāritā ca tathā smṛtā /
GSD36nars2_pu:435: cakravṛddhiś ca śāstreṣu tasya vṛddhiś caturvidhā // Nar_1.87 //
GSD36nars2_pu:437: pratimāsaṃ sravati yā vṛddhiḥ sā kālikā smṛtā // Nar_1.88 //
GSD36nars2_pu:438: vṛddhiḥ sā kāritā nāma ya rṇikena svayaṃkṛtā /
GSD36nars2_pu:439: vṛddher api punar vṛddhiś cakravṛddhir udāhṛtā // Nar_1.89 //
GSD36nars2_pu:441: deśācāravidhis tv anyo yatra rṇam avatiṣṭhati // Nar_1.90 //
GSD36nars2_pu:445: ghṛtasyāṣṭaguṇā vṛddhiḥ strīpaśūnāṃ ca saṃtatiḥ // Nar_1.92 //
GSD36nars2_pu:447: āyudhānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ carmaṇas tāmralohayoḥ // Nar_1.93 //
GSD36nars2_pu:448: anyeṣāṃ caiva sarveṣām iṣṭakānāṃ tathaiva ca /
GSD36nars2_pu:449: akṣayyā vṛddhir eteṣāṃ manur āha prajāpatiḥ // Nar_1.94 //
GSD36nars2_pu:451: vṛddhir aṣṭaguṇā jñeyā guḍasya lavaṇasya ca // Nar_1.95 //
GSD36nars2_pu:452: na vṛddhiḥ prītidattānāṃ syād anākāritā kvacit /
GSD36nars2_pu:453: anākāritam apy ūrdhvaṃ vatsarārdhād vivardhate // Nar_1.96 //
GSD36nars2_pu:455: vṛddhis tu yoktā dhānyānāṃ vārdhuṣyaṃ tad udāhṛtam // Nar_1.97 //
GSD36nars2_pu:457: āpatsv api hi kaṣṭāsu brāhmaṇasya na vārdhuṣam // Nar_1.98 //
GSD36nars2_pu:458: brāhmaṇasya tu yad deyaṃ sānvayasya na cāsti saḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:460: yadā tu na svakulyāḥ syur na ca saṃbandhibāndhavāḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:461: tadā dadyāt svajātibhyas teṣv asatsv apsu nikṣipet // Nar_1.100 //
GSD36nars2_pu:463: adadad yācyamānas tu śeṣahānim avāpnuyāt // Nar_1.101 //
GSD36nars2_pu:464: lekhyaṃ dadyād ṛṇe śuddhe tadabhāve pratiśravam /
GSD36nars2_pu:465: dhanikarṇikayor evaṃ viśuddhiḥ syāt parasparam // Nar_1.102 //
GSD36nars2_pu:466: viśrambhahetū dvāv atra pratibhūr ādhir eva ca /
GSD36nars2_pu:467: likhitaṃ sākṣiṇaś ca dve pramāṇe vyaktikārake // Nar_1.103 //
GSD36nars2_pu:469: trividhaḥ pratibhūr dṛṣṭas triṣv evārtheṣu sūribhiḥ // Nar_1.104 //
GSD36nars2_pu:471: pratibhūs tad ṛṇaṃ dadyād anupasthāpayaṃs tathā // Nar_1.105 //
GSD36nars2_pu:472: bahavaś cet pratibhuvo dadyus te 'rthaṃ yathākṛtam /
GSD36nars2_pu:473: arthe 'viśeṣite hy eṣu dhaninaś chandataḥ kriyā // Nar_1.106 //
GSD36nars2_pu:475: ṛṇikas taṃ pratibhuve dviguṇaṃ pratipādayet // Nar_1.107 //
GSD36nars2_pu:476: adhikriyata ity ādhiḥ sa vijñeyo dvilakṣaṇaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:478: sa punar dvividhaḥ prokto gopyo bhogyas tathaiva ca /
GSD36nars2_pu:480: pramādād dhaninas tadvad ādhau vikṛtim āgate /
GSD36nars2_pu:481: vinaṣṭe mūlanāśaḥ syād daivarājakṛtād ṛte // Nar_1.110 //
GSD36nars2_pu:483: ādhir anyo 'dhikartavyo deyaṃ vā dhanine dhanam // Nar_1.111 //
GSD36nars2_pu:485: śakyaprekṣam ṛṇaṃ dāpyaḥ kāle kāle yathodayam // Nar_1.112 //
GSD36nars2_pu:486: śakto vā yadi daurātmyān na dadyād dhanine dhanam /
GSD36nars2_pu:487: rājñā dāpayitavyaḥ syād gṛhītvāṃśaṃ tu viṃśakam // Nar_1.113 //
GSD36nars2_pu:490: lekhyaṃ tu dvividhaṃ jñeyaṃ svahastānyakṛtaṃ tathā /
GSD36nars2_pu:491: asākṣimat sākṣimac ca siddhir deśasthites tayoḥ // Nar_1.115 //
GSD36nars2_pu:493: tat pramāṇaṃ smṛtaṃ lekhyam aviluptakramākṣaram // Nar_1.116 //
GSD36nars2_pu:497: tad apy apārthaṃ likhitam ṛte tv ādheḥ sthirāśrayāt // Nar_1.118 //
GSD36nars2_pu:498: ādhir yo dvividhaḥ prokto jaṅgamaḥ sthāvaras tathā /
GSD36nars2_pu:499: siddhir atrobhayasyāsya bhogo yady asti nānyathā // Nar_1.119 //
GSD36nars2_pu:500: darśitaṃ pratikālaṃ yac chrāvitaṃ śrāvitaṃ ca yat /
GSD36nars2_pu:501: lekhyaṃ sidhyati sarvatra mṛteṣv api hi sākṣiṣu // Nar_1.120 //
GSD36nars2_pu:503: na lekhyaṃ siddhim āpnoti jīvatsv api hi sākṣiṣu // Nar_1.121 //
GSD36nars2_pu:506: yasmin syāt saṃśayo lekhye bhūtābhūtakṛte kvacit /
GSD36nars2_pu:513: sākṣibhyo likhitaṃ śreyo likhitena tu sākṣiṇaḥ // Nar_1.125 //
GSD36nars2_pu:515: kartavyam anyal lekhyaṃ syād eṣa lekhyavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ // Nar_1.126 //
GSD36nars2_pu:519: śrotrasya yat paro brūte cakṣuṣaḥ kāyakarma yat // Nar_1.128 //
GSD36nars2_pu:520: ekādaśavidhaḥ sākṣī sa tu dṛṣṭo manīṣibhiḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:521: kṛtaḥ pañcavidhas teṣāṃ ṣaḍvidho 'kṛta ucyate // Nar_1.129 //
GSD36nars2_pu:522: likhitaḥ smāritaś caiva yadṛcchābhijña eva ca /
GSD36nars2_pu:523: gūḍhaś cottarasākṣī ca sākṣī pañcavidhaḥ smṛtaḥ // Nar_1.130 //
GSD36nars2_pu:525: grāmaś ca prāḍvivākaś ca rājā ca vyavahāriṇām // Nar_1.131 //
GSD36nars2_pu:526: kāryeṣv abhyantaro yaḥ syād arthinā prahitaś ca yaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:527: kulaṃ kulavivādeṣu bhaveyus te 'pi sākṣiṇaḥ // Nar_1.132 //

GSD36nars2_pu:1790: kārṣāpaṇapramāṇaṃ tu nibaddham iha vai tayā // Nar_19.67 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1791: kārṣāpaṇo 'ṇḍikā jñeyāś catasras tās tu dhānakaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:1792: taddvādaśa suvarṇasya dīnāraś citrakaḥ smṛtaḥ // Nar_19.68 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1793: vārttāṃ trayīṃ cāpy atha daṇḍanītim rājānuvartet saṃtatāpramattaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:1794: hanyād upāyair nipuṇair gṛhītān pure ca rāṣṭre nigṛhṇīyāt pāpān // Nar_19.69 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1796: yadā sākṣī na vidyate vivāde vadatāṃ nṛṇām /
GSD36nars2_pu:1797: tadā divyaiḥ parīkṣeta śapathaiś ca pṛthagvidhaiḥ // Nar_20.1 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1799: devatāpitṛpādāś ca dattāni sukṛtāni ca // Nar_20.2 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1801: alpeṣu ca naraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ śapathaiḥ śāpayen naram // Nar_20.3 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1802: ete hi śapathāḥ proktāḥ sukarās svalpasaṃśaye /
GSD36nars2_pu:1803: sāhaseṣv abhiśāpe ca vidhir divyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // Nar_20.4 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1805: divyaḥ pañcavidho jñeya ity āha bhagavān manuḥ // Nar_20.5 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1806: dhaṭo 'gnir udakaṃ caiva viṣaṃ kośaś ca pañcamaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:1807: uktāny etāni divyāni dūṣitānāṃ viśodhane // Nar_20.6 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1813: ṣaḍḍhastaṃ tu tayor dṛṣṭaṃ pramāṇaṃ parimāṇataḥ // Nar_20.8 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1814: pādayor antaraṃ hastaṃ bhaved adhyardham eva ca /
GSD36nars2_pu:1815: śikyadvayaṃ samāsajya dhaṭe karkaṭake dṛḍhe // Nar_20.9 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1816: tulayitvā naraṃ pūrvaṃ cihnaṃ kuryād dhaṭasya tu /
GSD36nars2_pu:1817: kakṣāsthānena taṃ tulyam avatārya tato dhaṭāt // Nar_20.10 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1819: tasminn evaṃ kṛte sā cet kakṣe sthāpya suniścalā // Nar_20.11 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1820: tulito yadi vardheta śuddhaḥ syān nātre saṃśayaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:1821: samo vā hīyamāno vā na viśuddho bhaven naraḥ // Nar_20.12 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1823: tvaṃ vetsi sarvabhūtānāṃ pāpāni sukṛtāni ca /
GSD36nars2_pu:1824: tvam eva dhaṭa jānīṣe na vidur yāni mānuṣāḥ // Nar_20.13 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1826: tad eva saṃśayāpannaṃ dharmatas trātum arhasi // Nar_20.14 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1827: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi lohasya vidhim uttamam /
GSD36nars2_pu:1831: kalpitair maṇḍalair evam uṣitasya śucer api /
GSD36nars2_pu:1834: hastābhyāṃ piṇḍam ādāya śanaiḥ saptapadaṃ vrajet // Nar_20.18 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1835: na maṇḍalam atikrāmen nāpy arvāk pādayet padam /
GSD36nars2_pu:1836: na ca pātayetāprāptaḥ yāvadbhūmir prakalpitā // Nar_20.19 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1838: adagdhaḥ sarvato yas tu sa viśuddho bhaven naraḥ // Nar_20.20 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1839: bhayād vā pātayate yas tv adagdho yo vibhāvyate /
GSD36nars2_pu:1840: punas taṃ hārayel lohaṃ sthitir eṣā purātanī /
GSD36nars2_pu:1841: anena vidhinā kāryo hutāśasamayaḥ smṛtaḥ // Nar_20.21 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1846: yathāvad eva jānīṣe na vidur yāni mānuṣāḥ // Nar_20.23 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1848: tad enaṃ saṃśayāpannaṃ dharmatas trātum arhasi // Nar_20.24 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1849: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi toyasya vidhim uttamam /
GSD36nars2_pu:1851: madhyamas tu śaro grāhyaḥ puruṣeṇa yavīyasā /
GSD36nars2_pu:1852: pratyānītasya tasyātha sa viśuddho bhaven naraḥ // Nar_20.26 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1853: anyathā na viśuddhaḥ syād ekāṅgam api darśayet /
GSD36nars2_pu:1854: sthānād anyatra vā gacched yasmin pūrvaṃ niveṣitaḥ // Nar_20.27 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1855: striyas tu na balāt kāryā na pumān api durbalaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:1856: bhīrutvād yoṣito mṛtyuḥ kṛśasyāpi balāt kuryāt /
GSD36nars2_pu:1857: sahasā prāpnuyāt sarvāṃs tasmād etān na majjayet // Nar_20.28 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1860: yataś cāgnir abhūd asmāt tatas toyaṃ viśiṣyate // Nar_20.30 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1862: tasmāt satyena bhagavañ jaleśa trātum arhasi // Nar_20.31 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1863: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi viṣasya vidhim uttamam /
GSD36nars2_pu:1864: tulayitvā viṣaṃ pūrvaṃ deyam etad dhimāgame // Nar_20.32 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1865: na pūrvāhṇe na madhyāhne na saṃdhyāyāṃ tu dharmavit /
GSD36nars2_pu:1866: śaradgrīṣmavasanteṣu varṣāsu ca na dāpayet // Nar_20.33 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1867: bhagnaṃ ca dāritaṃ caiva dhūpitaṃ miśritaṃ tathā /
GSD36nars2_pu:1868: kālakūṭam alaṃbuṃ ca viṣaṃ yatnena varjayet // Nar_20.34 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1872: viṣasya tu yavān sapta dadyāc chodye ghṛtaplutān // Nar_20.36 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1873: viṣasya palaṣaḍbhāgād bhāgo viṃśatimas tu yaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:1874: tam aṣṭabhāgahīnaṃ tu śodhye dadyād ghṛtaplutam // Nar_20.37 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1878: viśuddham iti taṃ jñātvā rājā satkṛtya mokṣayet // Nar_20.39 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1879: tvaṃ viṣa brahmaṇaḥ putraḥ satyadharmaratau sthitaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:1881: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi kośasya vidhim uttamam // Nar_20.41 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1884: yadbhaktaḥ so 'bhiyuktaḥ syāt taddaivatyaṃ tu pāyayet /
GSD36nars2_pu:1885: saptāhād yasya dṛśyate dvisaptāhena vā punaḥ /
GSD36nars2_pu:1886: pratyātmikaṃ tu yatkiṃcit saiva tasya vibhāvanā // Nar_20.43 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1887: dvisaptāhāt paraṃ yasya mahad vā vaikṛtaṃ bhavet /
GSD36nars2_pu:1892: dadyād rājābhiyuktānāṃ pretya ceha ca nandati // Nar_20.46 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1893: na viṣaṃ brāhmaṇe dadyān na lohaṃ kṣatriyo haret /
GSD36nars2_pu:1894: na nimajjyāpsu vaiśyaś ca śūdraḥ kośaṃ na pāyayet // Nar_20.47 //
GSD36nars2_pu:1895: varṣāsu na viṣaṃ dadyāt hemante nāpsu majjayet /
GSD36nars2_pu:1896: na lohaṃ hārayed grīṣme na kośaṃ pāyayen niśi // Nar_20.48 //
